analysis.Summary: Vue component rendering a form section for editing customer personal details including name, phone number, and social messenger username.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable UI section within an orders module to capture and bind customer profile data to a parent customer object.

Components.Block: Layout wrapper that displays a titled section and applies spacing/margin classes.

Components.Field: Generic text input component used for binding simple string fields (e.g., customer.profile.name, socials).

Components.FieldPhone: Specialized phone input component with country selection; binds phone number and emits country code.

Components.Select: Dropdown selector used to choose a messenger platform; updates a local `messengerSelected` state.

setCountry.description: Event handler for FieldPhone `@country` event; assigns the selected country code to `customer.number`.

updateMessenger.description: Event handler for Select `@update:select` event; updates the local `messengerSelected` ref.

analysis.Usage: Imported as `FormCustomerDetails.vue` and used within parent order or customer form views. Expects a `customer` object prop and optional `title` prop; binds inputs directly to the `customer` fields.
Notes: No dedicated <style> section; styling is applied via utility CSS classes.
Uses `v-model:field` on custom Field components to bind nested object properties.
Default messenger option is set to WhatsApp, and default phone country is 'TH'.
